home.download_description: The world's first integrated entertainment original APP, as smooth as possible, perfect operation. Top e-sports events, live entertainment. Lottery betting and electronic games, etc., the latest and most complete entertainment items are all in the palm of your hand. Scan the QR code to download and have it now!
home.top_games_text: We have everything you want, bringing you a rich gaming experience
home.services_text: We wholeheartedly provide you with the best quality service
home.experty1_description: The financial processing system independently developed by the latest technology truly achieves extremely fast deposit, withdrawal, and transfer Exclusive network technology provides you with a first-class gaming experience and maximizes network delay optimization
home.experty2_description: Provide you with nearly a thousand exciting sports events every day, and there are more entertainment options such as live action, lottery, and video games, so that you can have a perfect gaming experience
home.experty3_description: Exclusively developed, using 128-bit encryption technology and a strict security management system, customer funds are best protected, allowing you to fully enjoy entertainment and betting on events without any worries
home.experty4: Multiple terminals for you to choose
home.experty4_description: Let you enjoy web, H5, and native apps such as IOS, Android, etc., allowing you to bet anytime, anywhere as you like! 7*24 hours online customer service to provide the most considerate and high-quality service
home.xunli_info1: On September 18, 2020, Beijing time, the Serie A giant Juventus Football Club and Xunli Sports, one of Asia's leading sports and entertainment platforms, held an official signing ceremony to officially announce their partnership. William Roberl, Director of Global Relationship Development and spokesperson of Xunli Sports, and Federico Palomba, Managing Director of Juventus Asia Pacific, attended and signed the sponsorship agreement.
home.xunli_info2: Since then, Xunli Sports has officially become the official regional partner of Juventus. Through in-depth cooperation, the two well-known brands will work together to work hard together until the peak, and strive to provide users with the best sports and entertainment experience.
home.native_text: High efficiency, safest and ultimate user experience
home.link: This button will lead you to a link

games.e-games_text: Flot e -sports brings you a different experience, bringing you the latest, fastest, the best, the best stadium information, play scores.
games.dice_text: Flood Loin is the leading provider of online games in Asia. The real people of Foili fully understand the needs of Asian players and their true hobbies, which prompts people to meet their growing needs
games.chess_text: The flood and chess and cards are the leading online providers in Asia.
games.electronics_text: Flood and Electronic played hi, floodli electronic slot machine, odds turned over, earned and earned, all kinds of surprise gameplay, many.
games.lottery_text: Flot Lottery is the leading online provider in Asia. It has a variety of lottery types and gameplay to ensure that you are satisfied with enjoying all kinds of lottery gameplay, discounts, and higher rates.

vip.title: VIP
vip.vip_text: Join Xunli VIP immediately to enjoy the top-level game
vip.rule1_text: Members' accumulative deposits and accumulative turnover meet the requirements of the corresponding level, and they can be promoted to the corresponding VIP level at 15 o'clock the next day
vip.rule2_text: If the VIP level meets the corresponding requirements, it can be upgraded by one level every day, but the VIP level cannot be upgraded by leapfrogging.
vip.rule3_text: After the member reaches the VIP level, the betting needs to complete the relegation requirements within 90 days. If the general upgrade is completed during the next period, the relegation requirements will be calculated according to the current level.
vip.rule4_text: If a member fails to complete the corresponding level maintenance requirements within one quarter (calculated within 90 days), the system will automatically downgrade one level, and the corresponding rebates and other benefits will also be adjusted to the downgraded level.
vip.rule5_text: The upgrade bonus will be automatically distributed by the system after the member reaches the membership level, and the upgrade bonus of each level can only be obtained once by each member. (Upgrade gift money can be withdrawn with 1 times turnover)
vip.rule6_text: Members who have their birthday within three months of registration will not be able to receive birthday gifts this year. Upgraded members need to meet the requirements to maintain the level before they can receive the birthday bonus, and the birthday bonus can be claimed once a year. (Birthday gift money is automatically issued by the system, and can be withdrawn with 1 times turnover)
vip.rule7_text: It is issued every Monday. After the member has received the last red envelope, the accumulative deposit has reached 1000. The amount of the red envelope distributed will be received according to the VIP level yesterday when receiving the red envelope. (The red envelope gift money can be withdrawn with 1 times turnover)
vip.rule8_text: The promotion discount can be collected on the VIP page by yourself. This discount is not shared with other discounts on the platform, but only shared with the rebate discount. (This promotional activity cannot be canceled after the successful application. If the account restriction is lifted, it is necessary to complete the specified turnover requirements after the activity application or when the designated account for applying for the activity is less than 5￥, please transfer any amount from the central wallet to the locked account or locked The amount transferred out of the account, the restriction can be lifted after the system recognizes it, and only the promotion discounts that meet the current level can be applied for)
vip.note: Note: The above are the maximum rebates for each venue, please refer to the actual game for the specific rebate amount
vip.xunli_rights: Xunli Entertainment reserves the right to modify, stop and finalize the event.
vip.remarks_text: Daily rebates will be distributed between 15:00-15:30 the next day.
vip.input_alert: It takes {{value}} flowing water to apply for this activity
vip.vip_member: Become a VIP member and enjoy the most honorable service

footer.xunli_about1: Xunli Sports has a legal license issued by the European Malta MGA and the Philippine government (PAGCOR).
footer.xunli_about2: Registered in the British Virgin Islands, it is a legal company recognized by international associations. Please make sure you are over 18 years old before registering and playing.
footer.xunli_copyrights: Copyright 2021-2028 Xunli Sports All rights reserved
